sentences.english: The disco ball over the rink sprinkled dizzying light through her long-again hair.
sentences.chinese: 在冰场的迪斯科球洒通过她的长头发又令人眩目的光。

sentences.english: The new look isn't very flashy, but it's clean and works extremely well.
sentences.chinese: 新界面算不上眩目，但简洁干净，非常好用。

sentences.english: The system is experimentally proved the features of stability and excellent anti-glare effect.
sentences.chinese: 系统经实际运行，性能稳定，抗眩目效果明显。

sentences.english: Your tired notions of "the market" make our eyes glaze over.
sentences.chinese: 你们令人厌倦的“市场”观念让我们耳眩目晕。

sentences.english: Clenched grip in the green Mo, glaring into the golden Chunhua.
sentences.chinese: 攥握在青青陌上，眩目成金灿灿的春花。

sentences.english: Their descendants became the dazzling white lipizzans.
sentences.chinese: 他们的后代就是这白得令人眩目的利皮兹赞。

sentences.english: The glare from the sun and snow blinded him.
sentences.chinese: 眩目的阳光和白雪刺得他睁不开眼睛。

sentences.english: Their descendants became the dazzling white lipizzans .
sentences.chinese: 他们的后代就是这白得令人眩目的利皮兹赞。

sentences.english: First, there was this absolutely stunning Ice Sculpture that was shaped in the form of her and her new grooms initials.
sentences.chinese: 首先就是眩目的，以她和新郎的首字母为原形的冰雕。

sentences.english: An anti - glare film, tailored for a custom look.
sentences.chinese: 一种反眩目膜，是按照传统审视习惯为您量身定制。

sentences.english: The invention provides an anti-glare purple glass for adsorbing ultraviolet rays strongly;
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供了一种强吸收紫外线的防眩目紫色玻璃。

sentences.english: The bright winter sun shone blindingly on the snow.
sentences.chinese: 冬日明媚的太阳照在雪上，发出眩目刺眼的光。

definition: to radiate/to shine/glitter of light/a glint
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
